## About Magnet
Magnet revolutionizes desktop workflow by providing intuitive and powerful window management capabilities for modern computing environments. This utility addresses the fundamental need for efficient screen real estate utilization, transforming how users interact with multiple applications simultaneously. The application runs seamlessly in the background, ready to organize windows with simple keystrokes or mouse gestures.

Available for both macOS and Windows platforms, Magnet enhances productivity by eliminating the tedious manual window resizing and positioning. Its intelligent algorithms understand screen dimensions and application relationships, allowing for perfect window arrangements that adapt to various monitor setups from single displays to complex multi-monitor workstations.

## âš™ï¸ System Requirements

**For macOS:**
*   macOS Catalina 10.15 or later
*   64-bit processor
*   2 GB RAM (4 GB recommended)
*   50 MB of available storage space

**For Windows:**
*   Windows 10 (64-bit) or later
*   2 GB RAM (4 GB recommended)
*   DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
*   50 MB of available storage space
